.. Two_Way documentation master file, created by
   sphinx-quickstart on Fri Sep 28 11:35:29 2018.
   You can adapt this file completely to your liking, but it should at least
   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to Two_Way's documentation!
===================================

Contained with in this site, you'll find everything that is needed to understand, operate, and develop for the Two Way project.
This page will be initially sparse but, given time, it will grow as more and more information is found. The intended function
of this page is to be purely for the developers of Two Way, but any and everyone is free to use it. 

Changelog
+++++++++

[0.0.1] RC-0003: Initial setup of documentation
